<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ironblood Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=459) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 163 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are unarmored.

</column>

---

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

<title level="2">Ironblood Stance leads to...</title>
[Ironblood Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=473)
name: Ironblood Stance
